name: Homemade Turkey Breakfast Sausage
author: cathy35
summary: Homemade turkey sausage flavored with sage, marjoram, and a bit of red pepper with no preservatives. Freeze individually to store and cook throughout the week.
directions: Mix sage, salt, black pepper, red pepper flakes, and marjoram together in a small bowl
Place turkey in a large bowl and mix the spice mixture into the turkey using your hands; form into patties
Cook patties in a large skillet over medium-high heat until no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 5 minutes per side
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
